sourcesContent:
export default function LeaveCheck() { // Auto-detect current month name const monthName = new Date().toLocaleString("en-US", { month: "long" }); // ---- MONTH-WISE CL POLICY ---- const totalCL = 1; // 1 CL per month // These will come from DB later const appliedCL = 0; // Approved leaves in this month const pendingCL = 0; // Pending leaves in this month // Remaining CL calculation const remainingCL = totalCL - appliedCL - pendingCL; return (

Leave Balance – {monthName}

Leave Type Total Applied Pending Remaining
Casual Leave (CL) {totalCL} {appliedCL} {pendingCL} 0 ? "green" : "red" }}> {remainingCL}
Loss of Pay (LOP) — 0 0 —
); }
